oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: McDonald Craig, Jack Martin, and Thomas Maupin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: McDonald Craig, Jack Martin and Thomas Maupin -- all profiled artists in "Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies" -- attend the opening reception for the companion exhibit at the Ned Ray McWherter West TN Cultural Arts Center, Madison Co., 2011.
Dixon was contracted by the TAC to handle photographic duties for this project. Robert Cogswell, director of TAC's Folklife Program, provided text for the book and exhibit project.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Craig, McDonald; Martin, Jack; Maupin, Thomas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Everts-Boehm, Dana
